title: Sore Ike! Anpanman: Chibikko Santa no Niconico Christmas

alternative_titles.ja: それいけ！アンパンマン ちびっこサンタのニコニコクリスマス

synopsis:
Today is the long-awaited Christmas! In Christmas Valley, there are plenty of gift-bearing fruits again this year! An apprentice Santa named Nicola arrives. She's training to become a great Santa Claus! But then Baikinman captures Santa and Rudolph! At this rate, Christmas will be ruined! We have to hurry and rescue the Santas!

(Source: Amazon, translated)
